title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 450.9 - Services to policyholders and to the public
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 450.9 - Services to policyholders and to the public

State Regulations

All officers and employees of the State Fund are expected to
render prompt, efficient and courteous service at all times and in such manner
as best to forward the interests of the Fund in meeting its responsibilities to
policyholders, to claimants and to the public. Field services are to be
designed and continuously carried out: (a) to promote among employers the
enthusiastic acceptance of and interest in the prevention of work accidents and
occupational diseases; (b) to
maintain at the highest possible level the State Insurance Fund's services to
its policyholders in the fields of safety and customer relations; and
(c) to inform present and prospective
policyholders of the functions and services of the State Insurance Fund through
approved programs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
450.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
